preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Transparent facial orthosis (TFO) assessment", "Mouth impairment and disability (MIDA) assessment", "Upper limb prosthetic assessment", "Splints", "Surgical guide (SG)", "Hydrocolloid") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "3DA, Type of assessment");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to 3DA, Type of assessment

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("3DA, Date recorded","3DA, Type of assessment","3DA, Date of scan","3DA, Date of delivery","3DA, Session date","3DA, Referral source","3DA, Type of TFO activity","3DA, TFO clinical assessments","3DA, Date of follow-up session (TFO)","3DA, Referral (TFO)","3DA, Comments on referral (TFO)","3DA, Type of session (TFO)","3DA, Orthosis or prosthesis delivered? (TFO)","3DA, Comments on orthosis or prosthesis (TFO)","3DA, General comments about the session (TFO)","3DA, Date of discharge (TFO)","3DA, 3D treatment plan provided in Amman (TFO)","3DA, 3D recommendations for future treatment plan (TFO)","3DA, Comments on referral","3DA, Type of MIDA activity","3DA, MIDA clinical assessments","3DA, Date of follow-up session (MIDA)","3DA, Referral (MIDA)","3DA, Comments on referral (MIDA)","3DA, Type of session (MIDA)","3DA, Orthosis or prosthesis delivered?
